text: a naxa ɲama sagata Ala xa hɔrɔmɔbanxi. Mɛnni, a naxa mangɛ to, a tixi hɔrɔmɔbanxi sanyie sɛɛti ma sode dɛ ra, yareratie nun sara fee tixi a sɛɛti ma, Yudaya ɲama sɛɛwaxi, sarae nu fema, bɛɛtibae nu bɛɛti bama kɔrae xuie ra. Atalaya naxa a xa donma ibɔɔ xɔnɛ kui, a fa a fala, «Yanfanteya, yanfanteya!»
